member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Xlsm.XlsmFormatProvider
member.summary: Imports and exports workbooks in Excel Macro-Enabled Workbook (.xlsm) format, preserving VBA macros and scripts.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Identifier for this format provider, used for discovery and registration.

member.summary: Human-readable description of supported files (e.g., "Excel Macro-Enabled Workbook").

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Xlsm.XlsmFormatProvider.SupportedExtensions
member.summary: File extensions recognized by this provider (e.g., ".xlsm").

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Xlsm.XlsmFormatProvider.CanImport
member.summary: Indicates whether this provider supports importing .xlsm files into workbook instances.
member.value: The value indicating whether can import.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Xlsm.XlsmFormatProvider.CanExport
member.summary: Indicates whether this provider supports exporting workbooks to .xlsm format.
member.value: The value indicating whether can export.

member.summary: Reads an .xlsm file from the stream and constructs a Workbook instance, preserving VBA macros if present.

member.summary: Reads an .xlsm file from the stream with cancellation support, constructing a Workbook instance while preserving VBA macros.
member.param: The cancellation token used to cancel the operation.

member.summary: Writes the workbook to the stream in .xlsm format with cancellation support, preserving any VBA macros or scripts present.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Xlsx.XlsxFormatProvider
member.summary: Imports and exports workbooks in XLSX (Office Open XML) format, supporting full-fidelity roundtrip of spreadsheet data.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Spreadsheet.FormatProviders.OpenXml.Xlsx.XlsxFormatProvider.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Specifies that this provider handles files with .xlsx extension.
